attributes.action: Make sexual harassment a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details: We as women are tired of feeling scared to do daily things that men wouldn’t often think twice about, there should be no reason we should feel unsafe to live life normally or be harassed and objectified.
attributes.background: Make public sexual harassment a criminal offence and prosecute anyone found to be making non consensual sexual remarks towards people a criminal offence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
